# Output generated by @ua_chatgpt_bot

Ваше питання: do script black jack in c#

Відповідь: using System;

public class Program
{
    public static void Main()
    {
        Random random = new Random();

        int card1 = random.Next(2, 11);
        int card2 = random.Next(2, 11);
        int card3 = random.Next(2, 11);

        // print the 2 cards and the total
        Console.WriteLine("You have been dealt 2 cards");
        Console.WriteLine("Card 1: {0}", card1);
        Console.WriteLine("Card 2: {0}", card2);
        Console.WriteLine("Your total is {0}", card1 + card2);

        // player has the option to Hit or Stay
        Console.WriteLine("Hit or Stay?");
        string choice = Console.ReadLine();

        // if the player hits they get the third card
        if (choice == "Hit") 
        {
            Console.WriteLine("You have been dealt a third card: {0}", card3);
            Console.WriteLine("Your total is now {0}", card1 + card2 + card3);
        }
        
        // determine if player has gone bust
        if (card1 + card2 + card3 > 21)
        {
            Console.WriteLine("Bust! You loose!");
        }

        // determine winner
        if (card1 + card2 >= 17 && card1 + card2 < 22 &&
            card1 + card2 + card3 < 22 && card1 + card2 + card3 > 17)

        {
            Console.WriteLine("You and the dealer tie!");
        }
        else if (card1 + card2 > 17 && 
            card1 + card2 + card3 > 17 && 
            card1 + card2 + card3 < 22)
        {
            Console.WriteLine("You win!");
        }
        else 
        {
            Console.WriteLine("You loose!");
        }
    }
}
